title: feat: dynamically calculated time allotted after demand [ARCH3-12205]

# Changes

## How to review this change

read code and test in gauntlet 

# [Merge Request Checklist v0.3](https://nomix.gpages.indexexchange.com/engineering/policy/merge-request-checklist/)

## Code evaluation
- [x] Code is written to adhere to [Code Evaluation Guidelines](https://confluence.indexexchange.com/display/QD/Code+Quality)

## Merge quality
- [x] I am confident these changes will lead to the expected outcomes and not have any negative downstream impacts, through testing in production-like environments and a strong understanding of the material
- [x] [System testing](https://nomix.gpages.indexexchange.com/engineering/edge/policy/testing/#system-tests) & [component testing](https://nomix.gpages.indexexchange.com/engineering/policy/code-quality/#integration-testing) are updated as needed to cover new logic
- [x] Follow up work (e.g technical debt, clean up, missing functionality) has been logged and linked in Jira
- [x] Changes have not introduced any new third party software unless licensed under MIT, Apache or BSD family
- [x] Changes reflect the requirements and acceptance criteria in the linked Jira
